name: theia-yang-extension
description: An extension for Theia connection language support for the Yang DSL
author: Project Theia

scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn install:languageserver && yarn run build
scripts.download:languageserver: curl -L -o yang-language-server.zip https://github.com/theia-ide/yang-lsp/releases/download/v0.6.0/yang-language-server_diagram-extension_0.5.0.zip && unzip yang-language-server.zip -d build/ && mv build/yang-language-server-0.6.0 build/yang-language-server
